Post-Match Reflections: France's Kylian Mbappe in action with Belgium's Amadou Onana
France coach Didier Deschamps praised their performance and achievement of reaching the quarter-finals.
France's Randal Kolo Muani mentioned pushing hard and bringing energy to the game.
Belgian captain Kevin De Bruyne expressed disappointment and regret over missed chances.
Belgium coach Domenico Tedesco stated they are too disappointed to go into details and will analyze the tournament in a few weeks.
France's Jules Kounde highlighted the team's defensive and attacking efforts and believed it was the best game of the competition for them.
Belgian goalkeeper Koen Casteels commented on the team's middling performance and the disappointment in the changing room.
